section.name: Beige WEB Store specification. Detail view of goods/services.
section.p: There are cases when goods/services list contains of full information and no more details need. If there is goods/service specifics that should not show in the list then this item will contains of link to its detail page according Integer ItemInList.detailsMethod and other fields. For example item of type SE Seller good and detailsMethod=2 means that will be used concrete JSP page designed for this.

In opposite to the list view detail one should be customized by using JSP code. For example JSP will check that SpecificOfItemGroup.description="method1" and render it with this method. So SpecificOfItemGroup.teplateStart/End/Detail is useless for detail view cause this is less flexible method.
section.h5: Embedded HTML, e.g. SE seller made full description of its goods.
section.p: It's hard to make reliable view from foreign embedded HTML. It must be restricted(current style friendly), embedded HTML editor and the HTML content can be stored in a file (in case of big content). This HTML content can uses/contains user downloaded images.
